reviews.review_msg: not worth the one credit, not an experienced prof
Nice person awful lecturer for her area of expertise

I took FASS207 with Ms. Dhaliwal last summer. It was a one-credit course, which meant we either received a pass or a fail in the class. Her lectures were amazing and very engaging. She gave really good feedback on our papers. It has been a while since I've been in her class but I still remember the amazing prof that she is and that she cared!

Too much work for a one credit course, not worth it. Prof is inexperienced. I would've tried another FASS course if they were open, so if you can get into another one don't take FASS 207 with this prof. Rubrics and assignments were vague. No feedback on assignments. Prof is a nice person, but I wouldn't recommend the course.
